Home » 17A10 Dasakanipātapāḷi » 4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 4.4 Ariyamaggavagga
4.4.9 Anussaritabbasutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Ariyamaggavagga
Anussaritabbasutta
197.
1379“Anussaritabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nānussaritabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, nānussaritabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  micchādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, nānussaritabbo dhammo.
1380Katamo ca, bhikkhave, anussaritabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe…  sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anussaritabbo dhammo”ti.
1381Navamaṃ.
